Articles.Content:
Currently trying to build my first space station, or at least the center chunk of it, and have run into a minor (maybe major) issue when trying to connect things together.

This is in Career mode, so I don't have all of the building bits just yet, in case there is something that might make it work better.

The place I'm having trouble getting actually connected is between the two small RCS tanks on the outer "arms". If I put another tank in there it only wants to connect to either the top, or bottom, but not both. I'm sure I've missed some simple fix, or general construction technique, but any help or comment would be appreciated. Thanks.

Edited January 3, 2015 by Repseki
Sadly, I think thats how ksp works right now, in which you can only attach items to one node at a time if the nodes are inline.
Docking ports or struts are your only options for that sort of multiple connection.
